about_the_game:
Gyrate those servos and swing those hip-units to six of the finest simulations of classic 80s hip-hop auditory vibration! Featuring such tracks as "Alley OOP", "Dunk It Like A Human" and "Let's Get Ready to Calculate Trajectories of Rubber Orange Spheres", the Regular Human Basketball Original Soundtrack is the perfect addition to any boom-box cassette or hard disk drive.

Track List:
  • 01 - Ryan Hizer - Alley OOP
  • 02 - Craig Barnes - Let's Get Ready to Calculate Trajectories of Rubber Orange Spheres
  • 03 - 2 Mello - get(Down)
  • 04 - IndiGhost - Superstar
  • 05 - Christopher Yabsley - Dunk It Like A Human
  • 06 - Paul Kopetko - Bounce It

Also includes instrumental-only bonus disk!

Tracks available as 320kbps MP3s and located in your game folder.

name: Regular Human Basketball OST
short_description: The original soundtrack for Regular Human Basketball! This collection of baller 80s hip-hop tunes will have you waving your magnet-arms the air like you just don't exhibit the human ability to care!
